Description_lang: Attack with your $?s319032[poisoned blades][off-hand], dealing $sw1 Physical damage, dispelling all enrage effects and applying a concentrated form of your $?a3408[Crippling Poison, reducing movement speed by $115196s1% for $115196d.]?a5761[Numbing Poison, reducing casting speed by $359078s1% for $359078d.][]$?(!a3408&!a5761)[active Non-Lethal poison.][]$?(a319032&a400783)[Your Nature and Bleed ]?a319032[Your Nature ]?a400783[Your Bleed ][]$?(a400783|a319032)[damage done to the target is increased by $319504s1% for $319504d.][]$?a354124[ The target's healing received is reduced by $354124S1% for $319504d.][]|cFFFFFFFFAwards $s3 combo $lpoint:points;.|r

description_blz.en_US:
Attack with your off-hand, dealing 2 Physical damage, dispelling all enrage effects and applying a concentrated form of your active Non-Lethal poison.

Awards 1 combo point.
description_blz.es_MX:
Ataca con tu mano izquierda para infligir 2 p. de daño físico, disipar todos los efectos de enfurecimiento y aplicar una forma concentrada de tu veneno no letal activo.

Otorga 1 p. de combo.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Ataca com a arma secundária, causando 2 de dano Físico, dissipando todos os efeitos de enfurecimento e aplicando uma forma concentrada do seu Veneno Não Letal ativo.

Concede 1 ponto de combo.
description_blz.de_DE:
Greift mit mit der Nebenhand an, verursacht 2 körperlichen Schaden, bannt alle Wutzustände und verabreicht eine konzentrierte Form von Eurem aktiven nichttödlichen Gift.

Gewährt 1 Combopunkt.
description_blz.en_GB:
Attack with your off-hand, dealing 2 Physical damage, dispelling all enrage effects and applying a concentrated form of your active Non-Lethal poison.

Awards 1 combo point.
description_blz.es_ES:
Atacas con tu mano izquierda, lo que inflige 2 p. de daño físico, disipa todos los efectos de Enfurecer y aplica una fórmula concentrada de tu veneno no letal activo.

Otorga 1 p. de combo.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Vous attaquez avec votre arme tenue en main gauche, ce qui inflige 2 points de dégâts physiques, dissipe les effets de rage et applique une forme concentrée de votre poison actif non létal.

Confère 1 point de combo.
description_blz.it_IT:
Un attacco con l'arma secondaria che infligge 2 danni fisici, dissolvendo tutti gli effetti di rabbia e applicando una forma concentrata di un veleno attivo non letale.

Fornisce 1 punto combo.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Вы атакуете оружием в левой руке, нанося 2 ед. физического урона, снимая эффекты исступления и применяя концентрированный активный несмертельный яд.

+1 к серии приемов.
description_blz.ko_KR:
보조 무기로 공격하여 2의 물리 피해를 입히고 모든 격노 효과를 무효화하며, 농축된 형태의 활성화되어 있는 비치명독을 부여합니다.

연계 점수 1점을 생성합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
以你的副手武器攻擊，造成2點物理傷害，驅散所有狂怒效果，並施加一道濃縮的作用中的非猛烈毒藥。

獎勵1個連擊點數。
description_blz.zh_CN:
使用你的副手进行攻击，造成2点物理伤害，驱散所有激怒效果，并对目标施放浓缩形态的激活的非致命药膏。 

奖励1个连击点数。
